thread.title: Newton's Home And Office Works, llc
thread.title_full: Bulbs.com reviewed by Newton's Home And Office Works, llc

author: Newton's Home And Office Works, llc
title: Newton's Home And Office Works, llc
text:
I'm a commercial purchaser. Purchased bulk fluorescent tubes nearly 200, best packaging i've experienced from purchasing on line. Fastest ship time. Very accommodating, will definitely purchase again, no doubt !
Customer service is the tops.
